website_summaries.verdict: A budget-friendly option that offers both robust flavor and great health benefits. An ideal choice for crowd-pleasing party recipes.
pros: Rich in Omega-3 and high in protein, this wild-caught canned varietal is a great value
Customers enjoy making dips, salads, and pastas or simply enjoying on crackers
cons: Some think it has a bland taste compared to other smoked salmon
Packed in oil, which can alter flavor and add calories

customer_reviews.title: An excellent health food product, especially for Senior persons !
customer_reviews.text: Consuming sea food products, at least once a week, is a good eating habit. I bought a case of this Salmon, because according to Consumer Report's Health edition, (Jan.2020) , canned salmon, has even greater health benefits, than fresh salmon ? although fresh salmon is good eating also. A little more money buying via Amazon, but considering the weight to lug from retailer to home, especially for Seniors, I'm glad Amazon made the purchase possible
customer_reviews.author: gejome

customer_reviews.title: Smoke flavoring, not smoke?
customer_reviews.text: Note that this salmon does not appear to be smoked, but smoke-flavored (check the ingredients list). There is an artificial quality to the flavor that I find unappetizing.
customer_reviews.author: Apteronotus

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavor, texture and oil.
customer_reviews.text: Very yummy. Love the smoke flavor and the oil. Yummy!!! For those reviewers who complain that it is just a smoke flavoring need to get it straight. The package specifically says “smoke flavor.” There is no false advertising there. It seems that some people expect a prime and fresh Alaskan salmon but in a can. Pretty silly if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: "Smoke flavored. . . "
customer_reviews.text: In other words I doubt that this is actually smoked salmon. It is salmon with something called a "smoke flavor." Tastes ok, but I think there is some misrepresentation going on in the headline.
customer_reviews.author: Kit Marlowe

customer_reviews.title: Delicious salmon in robustly flavored oil!!
customer_reviews.text: The salmon is incredibly rich and tasty. I pair it with a variety of crackers and adore this flavorful treat!
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good to go
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. It doesn't smell too great but it's delicious (oxymoron, huh?). High protein & low carb. A staple for me, now.
customer_reviews.author: King Kong

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but taste is worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Took me a long time to find these, had these once a while ago and haven’t been able to find them at any store near me. I finally found these although they are a bit expensive they taste exactly the same as I remember, very delicious! They’re worth the price and you get quite a bit. Although I’ve already eaten 3 of them within the first day of receiving them. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Bree Harding

customer_reviews.title: Smokey Goodness
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for lunch with a salad or some crackers. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Penelope A. Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Great firm texture, consistant flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Always consistent flavor, firm texture and fresh. Havent had a rotten one or even questionable one in any order.
customer_reviews.author: Tangie Purvis

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: Really tasty! Easy to open. Great for lunch at the office, or on a picnic.
customer_reviews.author: Roadrunner

customer_reviews.title: Also the can is very easy to open
customer_reviews.text: This smoked salmon is delicious, just the right size for one serving. High protein and zero carbs. Also the can is very easy to open. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Retiree

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Instead of pills I use fish for my omegas. This is one of the better tasting canned fish. I put it on subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Court

customer_reviews.title: Bad.
customer_reviews.text: The oil is very low quality. It repeated on me. Will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Very good smoked salmon
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty smoked salmon that’s not too salty. It’s very good with crackers. It’s great when you don’t want a full meal but want a high protein treat.
customer_reviews.author: ShopTilYouDrop

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I would buy again, but You raised the price by $10.00.
customer_reviews.author: Bret M.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The taste in every can is fresh and satisfying. I will be reordering again, as this price is slightly better than the price I pay at supermarket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and a great value
customer_reviews.text: This salmon is almost better than fresh caught and grilled salmon. I love it, and even travel with a couple cans for emergency meals. It taste as good as an expensive meal in a restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: Jo'el

customer_reviews.title: Also did not get correct product
customer_reviews.text: I also did not get what was pictured but instead a “smoke flavored salmon” which was not good. Disappointed in the false advertising of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Rose

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS TENDER MOIST
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty,no skin or bones just fish.Taste smokey whether it's smoked or liquid smoke flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Deadbeat

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: These filets are delicious, especially with a dash of hot sauce & club crackers. It’s one of my favorite quick lunches!
customer_reviews.author: Linda K. Wing

customer_reviews.title: Great source of protein to store in your emergency pantry!
customer_reviews.text: I used this salmon on raisin bread; a container made two small, delicious sandwiches. If I read things correctly these tins could last four years.
customer_reviews.author: Dale C Ludi

customer_reviews.title: Red salmon tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Great! For some reason, i can't find canned red salmon in local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I enjoyed this salmon. I wish I had more.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Hays

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent for canned salmon. I eat it straight and love it, bones, skin and all.
customer_reviews.author: Craftergalore

customer_reviews.title: Better than outstanding for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful salmon. If you like smoked salmon you will have a really hard time finding better salmon at any price
customer_reviews.author: Larry A. Ownbey

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: The item shown is a tin of smoked salmon. What I received were smoke flavored salmon fillets. The taste was pretty good, but it was definitely not smoked salmon. The advertised item was very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great but cheaper in local grocer
customer_reviews.text: great product but I actually found it cheaper 2.36/box in my local grocer.
customer_reviews.author: professional1

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting what was in the picture which said "smoked salmon" instead I received "smoke flavored salmon" not at all the same not as good. I have gotten the bumblebee smoked trout before and there is a big difference. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Luke Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good and convenient for packing in a lunch or picnic.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn U.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved t here and eat them all the time for breakfast or dinner have repeated my order
customer_reviews.author: Beverley Junor Levy

customer_reviews.title: So good. Throw it on a cracker or biscuit
customer_reviews.text: So good. Throw it on a cracker or biscuit, Maybe a salad. Love this salmon. Smoke and oil is amazing..
customer_reviews.author: George R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Mom's getting older - a great solution
customer_reviews.text: My mom is 91 so we're trying to find easy things for her to prepare for herself. This was a winner...big time. Mom loves it and it's easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen C. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Would it be possible to reorder?
customer_reviews.text: The product was tasty and we used it to make salmon salad and salmon croquets.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bluth

customer_reviews.title: These are delicious! Took a can to California for ...
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious! Took a can to California for my daughter to try and she agreed they are worth every bite! Many thanks for carrying them. Kim Bernhard
customer_reviews.author: Frank Bernhard

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but the best for him
customer_reviews.text: My dog is allergic to chicken & beef. So I add this to his kibble. Nothing but the best for him!
customer_reviews.author: STC

customer_reviews.title: Be careful.
customer_reviews.text: Bumble Bee is a huge company of course...but 1. it tastes HORRIBLE 2. Last one I open was spoiled. Luckily I only took one bite and spit it out...but got sick for 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Howie

customer_reviews.title: Rinse out can with water after eating before throwing in trash
customer_reviews.text: Best flavored smoke salmon in a can for the price
customer_reviews.author: Warlock

product_meta.title: BUMBLE BEE Smoked Salmon Fillets In Oil, High Protein Food, Keto Food and Snacks, Gluten Free Food, High Protein Snacks, Canned Food, Bulk Canned Salmon, 3.75 Ounce Cans (Pack of 12)
product_meta.description: Style:Smoked Salmon FilletsA favorite among seafood lovers, these smoke flavored Coho fillets of salmon are delicious and ready to serve. BUMBLE BEE Smoke Flavored Salmon Fillets In Oil make a tasty addition to any salad, pasta or hors d'oeuvre tray. At BUMBLE BEE Seafoods, practicing sustainability is an organizational imperative. As a seafood company, no single aspect is more important, or more central to, BUMBLE BEE Foods’ sustainability program than ensuring the responsible harvesting and management of seafood we provide to our consumers. BUMBLE BEE Seafoods was founded in 1899 by a handful of dedicated fishermen. Today, privately held and headquartered in the United States, BUMBLE BEE Seafoods is North America’s largest branded shelf-stable seafood company, offering a full line of canned and pouched tuna, salmon, sardines, and specialty seafood products marketed in the U.S. under leading brands including BUMBLE BEE, BRUNSWICK, SWEET SUE, SNOW'S, BEACH CLIFF, WILD SELECTIONS, BUMBLE BEE SUPERFRESH, and in Canada under the CLOVER LEAF brand. The BUMBLE BEE brand has established significant consumer awareness and loyalty based on the quality, nutritional value, and affordability of its products.
feature_bullets: SMOKED SALMON: A favorite among seafood lovers, these smoke flavored Coho fillets of salmon are delicious and ready to serve. These make a tasty addition to any salad, pasta or hors d'oeuvre tray
SALMON: This pack of 12, 3.75-ounce cans of BUMBLE BEE Smoked Salmon Fillets in Oil will satisfy you and your family whenever you want a tasty and healthy snack or meal
QUALITY IN EVERY CAN: BUMBLE BEE Smoked Salmon are a reliable keto food and keto snack for those on a ketogenic (keto) diet
SNACK HEALTHY: Enjoy BUMBLE BEE Smoked Salmon as a great-tasting, protein-packed snack, healthy lunch or as part of any other meal
BUMBLE BEE SALMON: Compare the delicious taste and convenience of BUMBLE BEE Smoked Salmon to other brands of sardines and canned fish

BUMBLE BEE SALMON: Rich, delicious flavor ideal for most recipes that call for salmon. BUMBLE BEE salmon can be used in a variety of dishes ranging from a cool refreshing salad to a warm pasta. Get cooking with any one of our premium salmon products today
